title: RIP 1RP off 975RP skin
body: Bought a box and key, did some calculation (its prob weird to do so but hey I do it to spread my rp to their full use) anyways I ended up with like 974RP, RIP {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
What you can do, is to send a Riot Support ticket along with some art you made of League, they usually give you the 1RP after that.
It can be however bad; MS Paint works fine. The 'funnier'/'worse'/'better' the better. If this is your first time doing so they'll 100% give you that 1RP. Otherwise I'm pretty sure they won't let you a 3rd or 4th time.

So all in all, don't lose hope! Small things like this, Riot will take care of for you! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Seriously? Thanks a lot man! Already purchase some hard-ware to do arts concidently

Even a rubbish MS Paint fan art would do, like it doesn't have to be of any standard at all. Riot just likes to have fun with the community. You in no way have to take the 'art' thing too seriously; unless it's extremely good, they won't either. It's all fun and games; literally :P

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
hahaha alright thanks for the help, have you sent in any art-work before?  I would love to see it.
